name: Modifiers
description: Modifiers are alterations that can be made directly to a $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/scepter_guide)Scepter$() in the $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table$() that affect spell casting and/or spell behavior. They also come pre-modified onto Aspect Scepters.
